NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Performance Ratings and column Interview Stages is the flow between 182 and 393? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Excellent to node Final Interview, from node Part-time to node Good, and from node Full-time to node Excellent, which path has the largest flow?
